title: COSMOS 10 Pack of Led Flash Tyre Wheel Valve Cap Light For Car Bike Bicycle Motorbicycle Wheel Light Tire
feature: Package included: 10 packs LED Valve Bike Lights: 4 x Red, 4 x Yellow, 4 x Blue, 4 x Green, 4 x Colorful
More energy-efficient with light & motion sensors
Auto shining, No switch, 100% waterproof, fits for Presta & Schrader valve.

Please kindly note there is a piece of paper in the battery case that needs to be removed before use. Sometimes it still not work when you remove the paper, then you need to put them on the valve stem and ride, they will light up.
Batteries: Requires 3 x AG10 button batteries per light (included)
description: These LED Bike Wheel Lights are easy to install and remove; they fit most bicycles, motorcycles and cars. LED Bike Wheel Light features motion sensors, LEDs and replaceable batteries.The light will be off when the vehicle stops, on when it runs, and flash when you’re driving at night.Screws onto the valve stem of your car, bicycle or motorcycle in seconds. Package included: 5 packs LED Valve Bike Lights: 4 x Red, 4 x Yellow, 4 x Blue, 4 x Green, 4 x Colorful; 20 x Black Valve Covers
